query: SELECT id, sessionToken, filename, file_size, status, assemblyPhase, assemblyProgress, assemblyTotalChunks, assemblyStartedAt, created_at, completed_at, last_activity_at, finalFileUrl, finalFileKey FROM resumable_upload_sessions WHERE status IN ('finalizing', 'completed', 'active') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nXHNKWaT6KdAop.2df66c7cd877 --database SaoZcd7riW2zyxorRaqL7d --execute SELECT id, sessionToken, filename, file_size, status, assemblyPhase, assemblyProgress, assemblyTotalChunks, assemblyStartedAt, created_at, completed_at, last_activity_at, finalFileUrl, finalFileKey FROM resumable_upload_sessions WHERE status IN ('finalizing', 'completed', 'active') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20;
